dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Growth promoting hormone; Lignin; Bioactive preparations; probiotics
Growth promoting hormone; Lignin; Bioactive preparations; probiotics
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Active Microecological Agent, also known as growth promoter, probiotic, live bacteria preparation, and beneficial element, is a beneficial microorganism isolated from animals or nature, or artificially assembled through bioengineering. After cultivation, fermentation, drying, and processing, it becomes a biological preparation or live bacteria preparation used for animals. It can be divided into two categories: one is the internal microecological improver, which is added to the feed to improve the composition of the microbial community in the breeding object; the other is the water quality microecological improver, which is put into the breeding water environment to improve the bottom quality or water quality.
活性微生态制剂，又称生长促进剂、益生菌、活菌制剂、有益元素，是从动物或自然界中分离出来，或通过生物工程人工组装而成的有益微生物。经过培养、发酵、干燥和加工后，成为用于动物的生物制剂或活菌制剂。它可分为两类：一类是体内微生态改良剂，添加到饲料中，改善养殖对象体内微生物群落的组成；另一类是水质微生态改良剂，投放到养殖水环境中，改善底质或水质。
